id: 35, name: 'Samira Patel', title: 'Quantum Hardware Engineer', skills: ['Quantum Circuits', 'FPGA', 'Verilog'], rating: 5.0, reviewCount: 62, available: true, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517841905240-472988babdf9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2.25&w=256&h=256&q=80', bio: 'Developing hardware for quantum computing systems' } ]; const FindMentor = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedSkills, setSelectedSkills] = useState([]); const [showAvailableOnly, setShowAvailableOnly] = useState(false); const allSkills = [...new Set(mentors.flatMap(mentor => mentor.skills))].sort(); const filteredMentors = mentors.filter(mentor => { const matchesSearch = mentor.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || mentor.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesSkills = selectedSkills.length === 0 || selectedSkills.every(skill => mentor.skills.includes(skill)); const matchesAvailability = !showAvailableOnly || mentor.available; return matchesSearch && matchesSkills && matchesAvailability; }); const handleSkillToggle = (skill) => { setSelectedSkills(prev => prev.includes(skill) ? prev.filter(s => s !== skill) : [...prev, skill] ); }; return (
{/* Search and Filter Section */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Skills Filter */}

Filter by Skills

{allSkills.map(skill => ( ))}
{/* Mentors Grid */}
{filteredMentors.map(mentor => (

{mentor.name}

{mentor.title}

{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ★ ))} ({mentor.reviewCount})
{mentor.available ? ( Available ) : ( Unavailable )}

{mentor.bio}

{mentor.skills.map(skill => ( {skill} ))}
View Profile
))}
); }; export default FindMentor;
